page.title: 15Houses in the area
page.content: All the houses in Pendock are rather old.My house is next to the school as it once belonged to the school. Heathers was once a pub.Alex's was a bakery.People used to go to the shops in the village.Now there is only one shop because they go to the super markets,in near by towns.All houses are old because the Policy says you can not build a lot of houses at a time in the country side. Because the houses are so spread out,all of them have very large beautiful gardens.Lots of them have small areas of land and orchard attached to them,so some people keep goats or ponies.
